conbody.p: Unless an exception at 225.7603 applies or a waiver has been granted in accordance with 225.7604 , use the provision at 252.225-7031 , Secondary Arab Boycott of Israel, in all solicitations, including solicitations using FAR part 12 procedures for the acquisition of commercial items. If the solicitation includes the provision at FAR 52.204-7, do not separately list 252.225-7031 in the solicitation.
